sections.title: Shaman (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Shaman class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Shaman)
sections.description: Shamans are proficient with all simple weapons, light armor, and medium armor.

sections.title: Spell Casting (Shaman)
sections.description: Shamans cast divine spells from the shaman spell list, requiring preparation and Wisdom scores of 10 + spell level. They commune with spirit animals for 1 hour daily to prepare spells.

sections.title: Orisons (Shaman)
sections.description: Shamans can prepare 0-level spells called orisons that are cast like normal spells but are not expended when used.

sections.title: Spirit (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: A shaman forms a mystical bond with a single spirit that grants abilities, spells for spirit magic, and hexes. Greater abilities are gained at 8th level and true abilities at 16th level.

sections.title: Spirit Animal (Ex) (Shaman)
sections.description: A shaman bonds with a spirit animal that serves as her conduit to divine power and is required for spell preparation and spirit magic use.

sections.title: Spirit Animal (Shaman)
sections.description: The spirit animal functions like a wizard's familiar but is treated as a native outsider and can deliver touch spells/hexes at 3rd level.

sections.title: Spirit Magic (Shaman)
sections.description: A shaman can spontaneously cast one spell per day of each spell level from her spirit's spell list, enhanced with metamagic feats.

sections.title: Hex (Shaman)
sections.description: Shamans learn magical tricks called hexes as standard actions that don't provoke attacks of opportunity, with save DCs based on Wisdom modifier.

sections.title: Wandering Spirit (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: Starting at 4th level, a shaman can bond with a different spirit daily, gaining its spirit ability and spells for spirit magic.

sections.title: Wandering Hex (Shaman)
sections.description: At 6th level, a shaman can daily select one hex from either her spirit or wandering spirit, gaining two wandering hexes at 14th level.

sections.title: Manifestation (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: At 20th level, the shaman undergoes a transformation to manifest as a pinnacle of her main spirit.

sections.title: Hex Mastery (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: At 20th level, the shaman can select one grand hex from the witch's grand hex list.

sections.title: Shell of Succor (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: Grants temporary hit points equal to Wisdom bonus plus 1d6 per 2 levels, with special rules for damage interaction and daily uses based on Charisma.

sections.title: Spirit Boost (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: When healing spells restore a target to maximum hit points, excess healing becomes temporary hit points for 1 round per shaman level.

sections.title: Spirit of Life (Su) (Shaman)
sections.description: The spirit animal can cast stabilize at will and store cure spells transferred from the shaman as a swift action within 30 feet.
